taskDescription:
Suppose that the plane takes off at a <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>23</mn>
      <mo>∘<!-- ∘ --></mo>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{23^ \circ }</annotation></semantics></math> angle, and 1 mile from the airport is a 1,500-foot peak. At what altitude will the plane pass over the peak?
